name: Surreal Visual Style
description: Dreamlike and abstract with impossible scenarios, symbolic imagery, and subconscious exploration

prompt.base: Surrealist style, dreamlike atmosphere, impossible scenarios, symbolic imagery, subconscious exploration, abstract elements, Salvador Dali influence, metaphorical composition, reality distortion, dream logic
prompt.positive: surrealist art, dreamlike quality, impossible physics, symbolic imagery, abstract elements, metaphorical composition, subconscious themes, distorted reality, floating objects, melting forms, dream logic, artistic symbolism, surreal atmosphere
prompt.negative: realistic, logical composition, normal physics, mundane reality, documentary style, straightforward narrative, conventional perspective

variations.name: Classic Surrealism
variations.modifier: Dali-esque melting forms, impossible architecture, desert landscapes, symbolic objects, dream imagery

variations.name: Digital Surrealism
variations.modifier: modern technology themes, glitch effects, digital distortion, contemporary symbolism, cyber surrealism

variations.name: Organic Surrealism
variations.modifier: biomorphic forms, natural elements distorted, flowing organic shapes, nature-based symbolism

examples: A melting clock draped over a tree branch in a desert landscape, surrealist style, dreamlike atmosphere, impossible scenario
A staircase leading to nowhere in the sky, floating objects, surreal composition, dream logic, symbolic imagery
